solution_line_template: Aaron eats {eaten_fraction}*{cherry_sweets} sweets + {eaten_fraction}*{strawberry_sweets} sweets + {eaten_fraction}*{pineapple_sweets} sweets = <<{eaten_fraction}*{cherry_sweets}+{eaten_fraction}*{strawberry_sweets}+{eaten_fraction}*{pineapple_sweets}={sweets_eaten_by_aaron}>>{sweets_eaten_by_aaron} candy sweets.
The packet of candy sweets still has {sweets_after_aaron_eats} sweets - {given_to_friend} sweets = <<{sweets_after_aaron_eats}-{given_to_friend}={sweets_remaining}>>{sweets_remaining} candy sweets.
